author: Thorsten von Eicken
comment: The big failure of this app is that it does not reliably track in the background. When I switch to another app (for example to look at a trail map) it eventually stops running and no longer records the trail nor reports online. In addition the configuration is painful, there are settings and options, and there's a hamburger menu on the left and a 3-dots menu on the right. I've also seen it report a timestamp of 2066-04-08 in the last known info when looking at a real-time track from another device.

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content:
Hi. The app should not stop when you are using other apps. Some devices (Meizu f.e.) tend to kill background apps aggressively  to save battery. You can send an email to livetrackingapp@gmail.com for more info. 
I will check the incorrect timestamp and also take note of the UI so I can improve in a future update.
Thanks for the feedback!

author: Monica Hill
comment: Can I find my friend  on this  or follow him

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content: Yes, but the app must be installed on your friends phone so he can share his/her position with you. If you need more info write to livetrackingapp@gmail.com

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content: Hi. The app should be working correctly. You can contact livetrackingapp@gmail.com if you need support.

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content: Hi. The app is should be working correctly. Take into account that the app must be installed on the phone to be tracked. You can write an email to livetrackingapp@gmail.com if you need more help.

author: AA
comment: I have just tested this app..the main problem is that the tracking is not accurate - making this app useless.  If you walk around a stadium in one full smooth circle..all its shows is criss-cross lines on map resembling a five pointed star or something like that..

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content:
Hi. Thanks for the feedback. 

Unfortunately the accuracy problems are related to GPS signal. In general it works the best on open areas. This also can vary depending on the phones GPS antenna quality.

author: John Engrisch
comment: App doesn't track. It's telling me a phone is in another country when it's about 5 miles away

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content: The app uses Google Location. It should show the same position in other apps like Google map.   Please send an email to livetrackingapp@gmail.com so we can fix the problem.

author: Dereje Lengisa
comment: I'm new user let me try to use this app then I will give you my comment with 5 star or uninstall

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content: The app is not fake and it works. Take into account that the app must be installed on the phone to be tracked. If you are still having problems you can send an email to livetrackingapp@gmail.com for support.

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content:
Hi.
If you have any trouble with the app you can send an email to livetrackingapp@gmail.com.

comment: It just looks up my number only

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content: Hi. The app is designed to work that way. Once the map with your position has loaded you can press the share button located on the right top corner to send someone your position so he/she can track you. If you need more info you can send an email to livetrackingapp@gmail.com

author: John Kretschmann
comment: Just installed the app on my phone and my son's phone and sent him out on a run and for the most part the app seems to be working as expected.  However, there are a couple of issues.  First, the info screen that displays the track data is dim and grayed out whereas the ad is showing up brightly at the bottom of the screen.  Also the unit of measure is metric and I don't see a way to change it to imperial.  I took off one star because not only do I not like ads but in this case the ads actually seem to be affecting the screens ... and I don't see anyway to get rid of the ads.  UPDATE: Kudos to the developer for actually reading and taking the feedback comments into consideration.  Fix the dim info screen and allow switching between metric & imperial units and this is a 5 star app.

reply.author: Live Tracking
reply.content:
Hi.
Thanks for your feedback. I am working to fix the info screen (The background should be brighter but in some phones is too dark). The ads can't be disabled but they are not affecting this issue.

Currently there is no option to change the measurement units but I plan to add the option in a future update.
